root: ^"I thought... maybe I could fix this."

^"They said it was impossible, but what if I could gather everything
that made you... you?"
^"Fourteen pieces. That’s all it would take."
^"Then maybe... maybe I could see you again."

exploration_start:
^You feel the weight of what you're about to do, but there's no
turning back now. (Use arrow/wasd to move and collect objects)

c-0:
^"Forget-me-nots... Your favorite. You always told me memories
fade, but I never thought I’d forget your voice."
c-1:
^"All the places you wanted to go. Paris, Cairo, Rio..."
"We never made it past the front porch, did we?"
c-2:
^"The happiest day of our lives… Was it really that long ago?"
"It feels like yesterday."
c-3:
^"Your handwriting… so messy, so alive."
"Every page filled with your thoughts, your plans. Why didn’t I listen more?"
c-4:
^"You always said you didn’t have enough time."
"I never realized how true that was until now."
c-5:
^"That melody… It always made you smile."
"I can almost hear you humming along."
c-6:
^"I used to call you just to hear your voice."
"If I called now, would you answer?"
c-7:
^"You promised we’d grow old together..."
"This wasn’t old enough!"
c-8:
^"I remember when you smashed this."
"You were so angry, but it wasn’t at me. It was never at me."
c-9:
^"What did you want to say?"
"I thought you would tell me everything..."
c-10:
^"You carried this everywhere."
"You said it was for us, for our future, but I wonder...
was it worth it?"
c-11:
^"The brushes are dry, the paints cracked."
"You stopped creating... and I never asked why."
c-12:
^"You kept this? Even after all the fights, all the silence...
you still held onto me."
c-13:
^"It’s just a shell. A hollow reminder that no matter what I do...
you’re not here."

attempt_revival:
^You’ve gathered everything. Every piece...
every memory, every dream, every regret."
"You brought them all back.
^"Why isn’t it working? I did everything right! I just want you back!"

^"You were never just pieces."
"You were whole, and I can’t bring that back."
closing_dialog:
^The space around you feels lighter, brighter somehow.
The weight on your shoulders begins to lift.

^"I’ll carry you with me, though. In every memory, every dream."
"I won’t forget you."
